product_name: Charlotte TilburyTravel Size Airbrush Flawless Setting Spray
summary: SummaryA lightweight, WATERPROOF** setting spray to prime and set your makeup for up to 16 hours* without melting, fading, or settling into fine lines. *Tested on 30 people **Tested on 32 people into fine lines.
details: DetailsFeaturesFrom Charlotte's award-winning Airbrush Flawless Finish collection.This multitasking, lightweight spray provides the perfect canvas for makeup application.Instantly locks in your look with a flawless, pore-blurring finish.It also features a delicate fresh floral scent.Key IngredientsFilm-Former Polymers: Form a strong but flexible, breathable film across the skin to keep makeup in place.Japanese Green Tea: Supports the natural moisture barrier for soft, hydrated skin.Aromatic Resin: Blurs the appearance of pores.Research ResultsIn a 1-week test with 100 women:94% agreed the product improves makeup longevity99% agreed the product creates a weightless veil96% agreed the product weightlessly sets your makeupItem 2619481How To UseShake the bottle well.Hold six to eight inches away and mist over your entire face.Use before and after applying makeup.Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes. Close eyes before misting.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Amp-Acrylates/Allyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Pvp, Phenoxyethanol, Pentylene Glycol, Propanediol, Polysorbate 20, Citric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice Powder, Parfum (Fragrance), Potassium Sorbate, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Camellia Oleifera Leaf Extract, Pistacia Lentiscus Gum, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Phenethyl Alcohol (Preservative).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Shake the bottle well.Hold six to eight inches away and mist over your entire face.Use before and after applying makeup.Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes. Close eyes before misting.
ingredients: Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice Powder

reviews.headline: Great but…
reviews.comments: Used occasionally when i would wear powder foundation. It melted everything beautifully! Only cons were that it started to make my super greasy, and if you don't use it often the sprayer would stop working. Almost as if it got clogged pr something.

reviews.headline: Yuck
reviews.comments: Made my skin bumpy from using and foesnt last at all actually makes greasy

reviews.headline: You won't regret
reviews.comments: If you have super oily skin dont get it . If your dry or combination GET it . First off you should use a primer that sticks like glue and after everything the air brush setting spray . Perfect combo . Melts everything perfectly together and make up looks like skin . The perfect air brushed look . Even with hust apply moisturizer, spf and blush , and then this spray , makes everything look like skin not cakey.

reviews.headline: BEST SETTING SPRAY
reviews.comments: Literally the best spray i had ever tried!! I have oily skin so whenever i tried setting soray from duffereng brands my skin still gets oiky but when i devided give charlotte tilbury a try my makeup doesnt get oily or anything my makesup last through the whole day.

reviews.headline: literally the best
reviews.comments:
skin type: sensitive and oily/combination

i have repurchased this like 3x at this point. i've used morphe, urban decay all nighter, maybelline infallible to switch it up some days and i keep coming back to this. i love the way kt just melts everything together. i have also noticed it helps prolong the wear of my makeup by at least 1-4 hours depending on the kind of base i have on. 

only con is that it can be a bit irritating some days (likely on daus after exfoliating or retinol) and when you start running out of product the spray gets very uneven and you get large droplets.

reviews.headline: Best setting spray
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this product. I am 53 and it works great for marure skim.

reviews.headline: A little too greasy
reviews.comments: Makes my face oily. Makeup does stay tho.

reviews.headline: I wanted to love
reviews.comments: I got this during a half-off sale. I used it a few times and it made me so greasy and ruined my make up. I had to throw it out. I'm so sorry I wanted to love this!! I didn't like the smell either. I love Charlotte products though :(

reviews.headline: Best setting spray I've tried.
reviews.comments: I have tried several different setting sprays and this is the only one that lasted all day. I have very oily skin and my makeup does not last more than a few hours. With this, it lasted all day long until late at night and my makeup was still perfect. My makeup did not start to melt off like it usually does after a few hours. I live in Florida and it survived the scorching and humid summer heat, walking outside in 95° weather as well. I highly recommend, especially if you have oily skin.

reviews.headline: love this!
reviews.comments: smells good and makeup stays on!

reviews.headline: perfection
reviews.comments: This is probably the best setting spray i have ever used. It is pricy but once you use it, you will realize it is 100% worth the $40. It works as both a primer and for setting. i have had issues with primers and setting spray because i have oily skin but this spray is perfect and it really sucks the makeup to my face. ive gone through 85 degree days in a work jacket and my makeup still stays on fairly well. It does melt a tiny bit in hot weather but ill take what i can get.

reviews.headline: Made my skin dry
reviews.comments: I've heard good things about the staying power of this product, so I decided to give it a try. It made my skin horribly dry to the point of making my makeup look cakey and causing my skin to flake. I thought it was a one-time thing and possibly I used another drying product, so I used it a second time on another occasion and had the same dry feeling. My face felt horribly tight, so I tried to spray some thermal water over, and it did not help. I do not recommend this product if you have dry or sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: My makeup lasts longer and it smells good
reviews.comments: It reduces creases and lasts longer makeup. I also love the smell. I use it as the last step but will try the recommendation to set it before my makeup.

reviews.headline: THIS IS SO GOOD
reviews.comments: I wore this on my makeup for a 3 hour matinee and a 3 hour night show I starred in. My makeup stayed beautifully. I also put this on top of my makeup before I went to a pool party (I didn't go underwater but I got splashed a lot) and it stayed perfectly!

reviews.headline: a little overrated
reviews.comments: definitely works well but it does smell a little weird and on the pricey side

reviews.headline: My go to setting spray
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this setting spray and will recommend it to ANYONE that likes makeup that I know. It locks my makeup in whether I'm hot outside or have sweat on my face bc of lights on the stage! There's no tightness or itching like other setting sprays. LOVE LOVE LOVE

reviews.headline: I would buy this product over again
reviews.comments: I use this product every day and it helps my makeup stay on and look good and it smells good

reviews.headline: Great for all day!
reviews.comments: This is probably the best setting spray on the market, I have absurdly oily skin and my makeup melts off within 1hr if I don't set it with this specific setting spray! I did a wear test and it was 90 degrees and I went to the gardens in full sun for about 6hrs and my makeup did not go anywhere AND my skin was not oily really at all so I 110% recommend this setting spray!!!!!

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: I normally do not use finishing spray.  However, I am so glad I bought this.  Just a fine mist melds all of my makeup together to look totally natural.  I absolutely love this.

reviews.headline: Overpriced and overhyped
reviews.comments: Lucky I bought this on sale because full price would just be ludicrous. The packaging is a complete fail. The lid does not stay on at all and the sprayer deposits globs of product, instead of a fine mist.  Traveling with the mini-size would just be a disaster in your travel make-up bag. The product is no better than drugstore setting sprays but at a ridiculous price point. ELF and Milani have setting sprays that out-performs CT. For higher-end setting sprays, BeneFit and Tarte have far superior versions.

media.headline: I would buy this product over again
media.caption: Slay

media.headline: I will restock this every time it runs out
media.caption: Gorgeous packaging

media.headline: If you want flawless buy this
media.caption: My dancing queen's competition makeup

media.headline: Trust me, Buy it!! Beautiful-Airbrushed-Melt Into Skin
media.caption: Amazing! Never using anything else!

media.headline: Would definitely continue to purchase this item
media.caption: Airbrushed to perfection

faceoff_positive.comments: So, I saw that a bunch of people bought this a lot like a year or two ago bc of tt and I was like "eh whatever, it's probably overhyped and unnecessary", right? So, I saw that one of my coworkers saw Melanie Martinez last year and his makeup STAYED (keep in mind that the concert was in summer) and I was really curious so I bought the mini and tried it out. it kept my makeup in place! the first time I used it, it felt like I had a second skin (almost like a filmy layer) but the other times I used it, it has never been an issue. I was scared because of the scent since I have super sensitive skin but it hasn't broken me out (I hope it stays that way). I will say tho, I do layer my makeup differently. I either use this spray to help melt in my cream products or I'll use the classic Mac fix+. Anyway, I recently saw aventura and I used this as my final spray to lock everything in and yallllllll it stayed in place! no touch ups whatsoever and I left the house at around 4pm but the concert started at 9pm so I was out and about, but, everything was good! I will say— THIS IS MY EXPERIENCE WITH THE SPRAY AND MY EXPERIENCE ONLY. so, if it doesn't work for you, I'm sorry. :( if it does end up working for you, that's great! either way, we all have different skin and if our skin likes something else, that's totally fine! :D
faceoff_positive.headline: Concert Proof! :)

faceoff_negative.comments: I do not recommend this. It made my foundation lift off so easily compared to not using any setting spray at all. My face didn't feel sticky or anything after spraying, but if I got water on my face. My foundation was gone underneath. I have bangs so I have to get my bangs wet to style them and if I get any water along my hairline, my foundation was gone. But I never had that issue if I didn't use this spray. Also if I brush my teeth while I have foundation on and I happen to get like a drop of water on my chin, have a drip mark where the water was, and I'll have to figure out how to patch that up with more foundation. This is definitely not for me, especially living in the Pacific Northwest. I'm sure if it rained in I got any drops of water on my face. I would have streaky marks on my face. Or if I cried, I bet this would leave tears streaks down my cheeks. I think I'm gonna stick to spray because that seems to work best. I'm glad I got this as a free sample. I would not spend the money on this at all.
faceoff_negative.headline: Does not make foundation last

rollup.name: Travel Size Airbrush Flawless Setting Spray
